name: SQSTool
modelDescription: Execute AWS SQS (Simple Queue Service) commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: ListQueues {command:'ListQueues', params:{}}. GetQueueUrl {command:'GetQueueUrl', params:{QueueName:'my-queue'}}. SendMessage {command:'SendMessage', params:{QueueUrl:'https://...', MessageBody:'text'}}. ReceiveMessage {command:'ReceiveMessage', params:{QueueUrl:'https://...', MaxNumberOfMessages:10}}. DeleteMessage {command:'DeleteMessage', params:{QueueUrl:'https://...', ReceiptHandle:'handle'}}.
userDescription: Manage SQS queues and send/receive messages

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty.

QueueUrl.description: Queue URL (Used by: ListDeadLetterSourceQueues (Required), ListQueueTags (Required), GetQueueAttributes (Required), SendMessage (Required), ReceiveMessage (Required), DeleteMessage (Required))

QueueNamePrefix.description: Queue name prefix filter (Used by: ListQueues)

QueueOwnerAWSAccountId.description: Queue owner AWS account ID (Used by: GetQueueUrl)

AttributeNames.description: List of attribute names to retrieve. Use ['All'] for all attributes. (Used by: GetQueueAttributes, ReceiveMessage)

DelaySeconds.description: Delay in seconds before message becomes available (Used by: SendMessage)

MessageDeduplicationId.description: Deduplication ID for FIFO queues (Used by: SendMessage)

MessageGroupId.description: Message group ID for FIFO queues (Used by: SendMessage)

MaxNumberOfMessages.description: Maximum number of messages to receive (Used by: ReceiveMessage)

VisibilityTimeout.description: Visibility timeout in seconds (Used by: ReceiveMessage)

WaitTimeSeconds.description: Long polling wait time in seconds (Used by: ReceiveMessage)

MessageAttributeNames.description: Message attribute names to retrieve (Used by: ReceiveMessage)

MaxResults.description: Maximum number of results (Used by: ListQueues, ListDeadLetterSourceQueues)
